ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Judgement will certainly take place!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Judgement will indeed take place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the Judgement shall doubtlessly take place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the Day of Judgment will inevitably take place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And undoubtedly justice will surely be done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, Ad-Din is sure to occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the judgment must most surely come about.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and surely the Doom is about to fall!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! the judgment will indeed befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the Judgement will surely come to pass --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily the Requital is surely to befall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed the retribution will surely come to pass!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily Judgment and Justice must indeed come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, the Recompense is sure to happen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the recompense shall surely happen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:6] and assuredly judgement, requital after the reckoning, will take place!, without doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! the judgement) reckoning, judgement and retaliation in it (will indeed befall) and happen.
